altTitles.ja: グリーンワールズ

description.en:
Plants have taken over the planet.  
  
In 2017, the vegetation in Tokyo rose up and toppled human society in moments.  
The few survivors are forced to live in the relative safety of a subway network, but supplies are running low.  
Join an average high school student named Akira as he challenges the plants in a struggle for survival!

altTitles.zh-hk: 豪娇美少女 凪原空

altTitles.ja: ごうでれびしょうじょなぎはらそら

description.en:
Shouta's an otaku who's only love in the world is manga. One day, he happens to wish for one of his favorite character, Nagihara Sora, to be by his side…and so she does! But what is he to do when he finds that his gentle and weak Sora has turned out to be a violent gou-dere (an unstoppable force that does whatever she pleases for her master, out of her love for her master) who views the world as a ero-game to be conquered for his sake?

Note: the order of some chapters has been altered to match the volume release.

title.en: Gorin no Megami-sama: Nadeshiko Ryou no Medal Gohan

altTitles.ja: 五輪の女神さま 〜なでしこ寮のメダルごはん〜

description.en: The main character, Kominato Ryo, who is only engaged in cooking, was allowed to enter the prestigious Cho Gakuen Private School on the condition that he work as a cook in a student dormitory under the supervision of his father. However, the “dormitory” was the women's dormitory where future gold medal candidates lived. The nutritional requirements of top athletes are naturally high. Fill their stomachs and take on the challenging mission of building your body for the Olympic Games!

altTitles.ja: グッド・ナイト・ワールド

description.en:
A story about four members of the same broken family who find peace in a game called "Planet." The catch is: they don't know about each other.  
  
As the story unfolds hidden things are discovered about each member and about the relation the virtual world has with reality and how they affect one another.

The best way for the diverse human beings who make up society to unite is to find themselves a common enemy. School is a mini-version of society, so why shouldn't the same thing happen in a classroom setting?  
  
This particular class has chosen Xiao Shang to be that common enemy. But one of its more popular students soon finds himself becoming intrigued by Shang's unapologetic, straightforward way of life.  

This comic is posted for free on the author's weibo: <https://weibo.com/u/3567976483>
description.pl: Najłatwiejszym sposobem zjednoczenia się różnorodnych jednostek, które tworzą społeczeństwo, jest znalezienie wspólnego wroga. Szkoła jest mini społeczeństwem, więc czy to samo nie powinno odbywać się w klasie? Ta konkretna klasa wybrała na wspólnego wroga Xu Shanga. Ale wkrótce jeden z najpopularniejszych uczniów w szkole staje się zaintrygowany specyficznym życiem Shanga.
description.pt-br: Ao e Xun são amigos desde a infância que mantêm um relacionamento secreto fora da escola, na mesma escola existe o aluno transferido Xiao Shang que esconde uma vida totalmente diferente através de sua natureza tranquila. Círculos Sociais significam aceitações e esses meninos buscam uma forma de como se encaixar nesse meio.

description.en: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.
description.ru:
В стремлении к запретным знаниям «человек разумный» опять напортачил — в 2012 году на волю вырвался смертельный вирус, начавший косить человечество. Умирали почему-то взрослые, и тут, откуда ни возьмись, явились вампиры и согнали оставшихся детей в свой подземный город, объявив, что отныне «людишки» будут жить под защитой клыкастых хозяев, расплачиваясь кровью. Резкий парень Юитиро пожил так 4 года и понял, что пора валить — вместе с названным братом Микой и всей «семьей Хьякуя», группой детей, выросшей в одном приюте. Конечно, вампиры легко догнали и перебили беглецов, ушел лишь один.   
Выйдя на поверхность, юный Хьякуя понял, что эпидемия кончилась, но мир изменился — кругом разруха, бродят демоны, а кровососы потихоньку расширяют территорию, предлагая жителям «крышу». Власть в Японии захватила семья Хиираги, сформировавшая Имперскую Демоническую армию, которая защищает людей и бьет вампиров зачарованным оружием. Свой путь Юитиро ясен — готовиться к службе, мстить за погибшую родню. Прямого и порывистого парня ждет немало сюрпризов и неожиданностей, но в таком поганом мире лучше надеяться на свой дар и свой меч, чем на волю судьбы и благосклонность правителей!

altTitles.ja: ゼブラーマン
斑马侠

description.en:
Grade-school teacher Shinichi just can't get any respect. His wife treats him like a nuisance, his daughter ignores his every word, his coworkers think he's pitiful. His students regard him as a bore and an imbecile, and mercilessly bully his son, who wants nothing to do with him as a result. The only place Shinichi can find any confidence and self-esteem is alone in his room, where he's secretly sewn together a costume. It's a perfect replica of the suit worn by Zebraman, the hero of a third-rate 1970s superhero show that nobody remembers except Shinichi -- and much to his joy, the new, wheelchair-bound student at his school.
At the same time, strange things are occurring throughout the area. The citizens are nervous, and the military has dispatched agents to uncover - or perhaps cover up -- the source of the danger. Shinichi's urge to sneak out and prowl in his costume, to feel what a hero feels when guarding the night from evil, soon has him dragged into an increasingly bizarre mystery.
description.pt-br: O professor da escola primária Shinichi simplesmente não consegue nenhum respeito. Sua esposa o trata como um incômodo, sua filha ignora cada palavra sua, seus colegas de trabalho acham que ele é lamentável. Seus alunos o consideram um chato e um imbecil, e impiedosamente intimidam seu filho, que não quer nada com ele como resultado. O único lugar onde Shinichi pode encontrar alguma confiança e auto-estima é sozinho em seu quarto, onde ele secretamente costurou uma fantasia. É uma réplica perfeita do traje usado por Zebraman, o herói de um show de super-heróis de terceira categoria dos anos 1970 que ninguém se lembra, exceto Shinichi - e para sua alegria, o novo aluno em cadeira de rodas em sua escola. Ao mesmo tempo, coisas estranhas estão ocorrendo em toda a área. Os cidadãos estão nervosos e os militares enviaram agentes para descobrir - ou talvez encobrir - a fonte do perigo. O desejo de Shinichi de fugir e espreitar em seu traje, para sentir o que um herói sente ao proteger a noite do mal, logo o arrasta para um mistério cada vez mais bizarro.

altTitles.ja: A-BOUT!!〜朝桐大活躍編〜

description.en: Asagiri's second year at Mitsumine.

title.en: Majo Taisen - The War of Greedy Witches

altTitles.ja-ro: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

description.en: Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches.” With the addition of the final witch, Joan of Arc, Walpurgis Night begins: Only one witch can survive, and have her wish granted!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

altTitles.ja: ゴレームハーツ

description.en:
In the world of Golem Hearts, creatures known as golems have become integrated with society, performing all sorts of tasks. These golems are created by the widely-respected "sorcery scholars," and obey the commands of their human masters without question. Noah is a sorcery scholar who strives to become the second best of his kind.  
  
To that end, he travels far and wide to study unique golems around the world. This journey leads him to a certain island, where he encounters a girl named Mary and her golem Murray. As the two get acquainted, we begin to discover that there may be more to Noah than meets the eye.  

---
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Golem Hearts were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.  
  
Prior to its serialization two "Golem Hearts"-oneshots were published, one of which can be found [here (RAW)](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/10833497643049550104).
description.fr: Dans le monde de Golem Hearts, des créatures connues sous le nom de golems se sont intégrées à la société, effectuant toutes sortes de tâches. Ces golems ont été créés par des "érudits en sorcellerie" très respectés et obéissent sans réserve aux ordres de leurs maîtres humains. Noah est un érudit en sorcellerie qui s'efforce de devenir le deuxième meilleur de son espèce. À cette fin, il parcourt de nombreuses régions pour étudier des golems uniques à travers le monde. Ce voyage le mène vers une certaine île, où il rencontre une fille nommée Mary et son golem Murray. Au fur et à mesure que les deux se familiarisent, nous commençons à découvrir qu'il peut y avoir plus à Noé que ce que l'œil ne voit.

altTitles.ja: ガールメイキル

description.en: A port town where the Mafia actively operates behind the scenes. Gohongi is a young man who has come back to this to place where he was born after many years and finds a job working at a video rental store, which also becomes his new home. It is here that he begins to live with a young girl named Mei and a homosexual by the name of Katsura. But both of them are members of the Mafia group, Lovely Town. And fifteen-year-old-Mei is a ruthless hitman. There have been rumors that the struggles between Mafia factions are becoming more intense. Still not able to completely grasp the situation, Gohongi winds up getting dragged into a world of trouble…

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

In order to clear the name of 'Emi,' a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess' revenge to begin!
description.id:
Agar bisa membersihkan nama "Emi", yaitu nama seorang gadis yang bereinkarnasi menjadi Remilia sang villainess dari sebuah game otome, Remilia asli yang selama ini mengawasi emi dari dalam akhirnya telah tersadar.

Sekarang adalah waktunya bagi sang villainess yang asli untuk membalaskan dendamnya!

description.en: 4-koma history.

Though Chichi the cat looks very cute, she has one goal: eradicate humanity and take over the world! She decides to recruit comrades to aid her in her quest, but it looks like world conquest won't be that easy?! 

Follow the adventures of Chichi the tyrant, Dunno the doggo who loves humans, and Kaiser Kang Taeshik, the hard-boiled wild hamster, as they face many hardships on their path to absolute dominion!
A group of high-school students had an accident on their way to a trip and died but they find themselves in a classroom with a black sphere.
description.ru: Возвращаясь с школьной поездки группа старшеклассников попала в аварию - никто не выжил. Но после они попадают в комнату с таинственным черным шаром…

altTitles.ja: 恋は双子で割り切れない

description.en: My family moved next door to the Jinguji family when I was six years old. From then until I was in the first grade of high school now, both parents were on good terms, and the twin sisters of the Jinguji family that I grew up with were my close friends as if they were like my own family. Ryumi, the sister who looks like a boy, and Naori, the otaku sister who is cute on the outside. And I'm Jun Shirasaki, who isn't afraid of being sandwiched between beautiful sisters with different personalities. Although I'm a novice in love, I don't have a special relationship and the changes continue. "Why don't you go out with me? How about we try dating?" These words from Ryumi eventually led us into a strange love triangle. The romantic comedy story of first love with twins begins!
description.id:
Keluargaku pindah ke sebelah keluarga Jinguji saat aku berusia enam tahun. Sejak saat itu sampai aku kelas satu SMA sekarang, kedua orang tua berhubungan baik, dan Saudari kembar keluarga jinguji yang tumbuh bersamaku merupakan teman dekatku seolah-olah mereka sudah seperti keluargaku sendiri.

Ryumi, saudari perempuan yang berpenampilan seperti laki-laki, dan Naori, saudari otaku yang memiliki sifat imut di luar. Dan Aku Jun Shirasaki, yang tidak takut terjepit di antara saudari perempuan cantik dengan kepribadian yang berbeda. Meskipun aku pemula dalma cinta, aku tak memiliki hubungan khusus dan perubahan terus berlanjut.

“Kenapa kau tidak pacaran denganku? Bagaimana kalau kita coba pacaran?”

Kata-Kata dari Ryumi ini akhirnya membawa kami ke cinta segitiga yang aneh.

Kisah komedi romantis cinta pertama dengan si kembar dimulai!

description.pt-br: O protagonista Yuu Haruna se muda para uma cidade e conhece uma garota estranha chamada Fuuka (cujo nome tem caracteres kanji para "vento" e "verão"). Esta menina, que é como um vento de verão possui um poder misterioso para atrair as pessoas.

Now there, she goes about searching for work and starts by looking at a family restaurant by the name of "Humming Dining" . With her seemingly bottomless appetite and love of our hero's food, will our hero be able to keep his sanity as he goes about making her an exemplary employee AND fill her stomach?!

At first glance - he's a weak guy. Arutsu is one prone to sickness and has always been. He literally fights bacteria and viruses in other people, with his friends. Our weak hero appears! Wait… maybe he's not so "weak" when he fights?!

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%83%80%E3%83%96%E3%83%AB%E3%82%B2%E3%83%BC%E3%82%B8)

"Neopulation". After the world discovered a way to transfuse organs of other living organisms onto human body, human life has changed dramatically. This is the story of a boy named “Shin” who left his hometown, Kingdom of Laguna, with a mysterious character named “Dorara”. The two travel across the world on a journey to search for the Dragon’s body parts.

description.en:
A girl obsessed with a novel suddenly finds herself transported into the thick of the plot. The problem is, she has taken on the role of the villain in the story. And she knows how this ends… it's off with her head! Maybe she'll just let this play out and wake up back in reality… But after a few too many deaths to no avail, it's finally time to go off-script. She's going to have a little fun with this tale. She's made up her mind… to live!

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.fr:
Condamnée à mourir le jour de ses 20 ans puis à ressusciter encore et toujours pour l'éternité, c'est là, sa malédiction. Mais quitte à voir son avenir ruiné, autant vivre comme on le souhaite! La méchante est bien décidée à suivre cet adage et a changé l'histoire du roman où elle se trouve. L'héroïne, sa rivale? Plus question! Elle est tellement adorable, plutôt en faire sa meilleure amie! Le fiancé? Un prince héritier cruel et idiot, mieux vaut l'éliminer du paysage. Cependant, à chacune de ses décisions s'éloignant de l'histoire originale, le futur se modifie. Jusqu'où va-t-elle bouleverser le cours du roman et tous ses personnages?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.ko:
비참하게 처형당하는 소설의 악역으로 빙의했다.
사망플래그를 피하기 위해 별짓 다 해봤지만, 돌아오는 건 결국 죽음뿐.
세 번째 회귀하던 날, 나는 결심했다.
막 살기로!

“이렇게 살아도 죽고, 저렇게 살아도 살해당하는 판에
나 하고 싶은 대로 하고 살겠다!”

그러나 원작에서 너무 멀어진 탓일까.
원래대로라면 원작 여주에게 향했어야 할 남주들의 관심이
어째서인지 나한테 향하는 것 같다……?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.uk:
Вона стала лиходійкою в романі, якій судилося жалісна смерть. У своєму першому житті вона пішла за оригінальною історією і померла. Потім знову прокинулась в тілі лиходійки. Під час наступної спроби вона робила все, щоб уникнути смерті, але врешті-решт її знову чекала лише вона.
Як би я не жила, все одно помру, чи не краще жити так, як хочеться?
Проте, щось я надто далеко відійшла від оригінального сюжету. Чому раптом головний герой зацікавився мною?...

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.zh-hk:
她在一部小說中被當作惡棍附身，在小說中被悲慘地處決。

我嘗試了一切來避免死亡標誌，但最終，只有死亡浮出水面。在第三次回歸的那天，我下定了決心。讓我們活下去吧！

"如果我這樣生活，我會死，如果我那樣生活，我會被殺！"

但這是因為它離原版太遠了嗎？主角對原版女主角的興趣似乎以某種方式針對了我......？

altTitles.ja: どーにゃつ

description.en:
About a cat with a donut body in a post-apocalyptic world.  
  


---

A hilarious and touching story with a touch of horror, Donyatsu is about a cat with a doughnut body in a post-apocalyptic Tokyo, along with his food-based buddies, terrestrial enemies, shiritori-winning wreck of a robot/mecha, enigmatic food-based pig, and of course, the invading aliens…?   
  
If a manga that has sweet, sweet animals playing soccer with a human skull doesn't bother you, chances are you will crave Donyatsu.

altTitles.ja: ドリィ キルキル

description.en: Humanity's peaceful days all at once transform into an unspeakably odious hell. The sudden invasion of wasp-like insects, along with gargantuan "dolls" wielding their enormous alien weapons, annihilating everyone in their path. In the middle of the chaos, high school first-year, Iruma Ikaruga, fights to save his best friend and his beloved senpai from the dolls' assault with an unyielding spirit. However, all that awaits him is despair. Just what are the enormous puppets known as "Dolly"after? What fate awaits Iruma? The curtain has risen on humanity's "puppet show" of unimaginable despair, and the battle for survival has begun.
description.pt-br: Os dias calmos da humanidade se transformam em um odioso inferno. A repentina invasão de insetos parecidos com vespas, acompanhados de “bonecos” com gigantescas armas alienígenas, aniquilando todos em seu caminho. No meio do caos, um estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio, Iruma Ikaruga, luta para salvar seu melhor amigo e sua amada senpai do ataque dos “bonecos” com um espirito indomável. No entanto, tudo o que o espera é desespero. Mas o que são esses enormes bonecos conhecidos como "Dolly"? Qual será o destino Iruma? A cortina da da humanidade subiu no "show de marionetes" do desespero inimaginável, e a batalha pela sobrevivência já começou.

altTitles.ja: ダブルヘリクス ブロッサム

description.en: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.

altTitles.ja: 日本へようこそエルフさん。

altTitles.zh-hk: 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.  
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!  

- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!

altTitles.ja: グレイプニル

description.en: What does one consider to be a monster? A horrible bloodsucking vampire? Frankenstein's creation? Shuichi Kagaya has a secret. Other than having great grades and being skilled at sports, he isn’t what one would call normal. In fact, Shuichi cannot even be considered human. One fateful morning, he woke up as a monster. With brute strength, an abnormally strong sense of smell, big fluffy paws, and the depression and self-hate that comes after losing one's humanity, his life was suddenly flipped upside down. Claire Aoki, the girl he had decided to save, now holds his secret over his head. Claire is a sadistic and utterly twisted girl, with no sense of empathy toward the lives of others. Before meeting Shuichi, she was in the search of monsters, hoping to find her monster sister. Despite becoming a monster, Shuichi naively continues to hold onto his human morals, but how long can one last in this insufferable way of living?

description.de:
Nach einem langen Arbeitstag wird die Mitte-20-jährige Sei Takanashi in ihrem Hausflur von einem grellen Licht umhüllt und findet sich plötzlich in einer Parallelwelt wieder. Schuld an ihrer unfreiwilligen Reise ist das »Ritual zur Beschwörung der Heiligen Maid« am dortigen Königshof. Jene Maid soll die Kraft besitzen, die in diese Welt einfallenden Monster auszulöschen. Neben Sei ist mit Aira Misono noch eine zweite Frau erschienen, die vom Kronprinzen Kyle prompt zur Auserwählten bestimmt wird. Verstoßen und unfähig, nach Japan zurückzukehren, beginnt für Sei ein neues Leben in Slantania. Als Forscherin am Institut für Heilpflanzen findet sie schließlich eine neue Berufung. Da ihre magischen Tränke ungewöhnlich stark sind, kommt die Vermutung auf, dass sie doch die Heilige Maid sein könnte.

description.en:
Sei, a 20 year old office worker, is summoned to a different world after finishing some overtime work. But the person who had summoned her looks at her face and said, “This is not the Saint.” Instead, the other summoned lady is lauded as the Saint, while Sei is ignored.

Offended at being discarded without a second thought, Sei leaves the royal palace and looks for occupation, and she starts working at a laboratory where she makes potions and cosmetics. She uses her magic to grant people’s requests and slowly people begin suspecting that she is the actual Saint…

Can Sei enjoy her slow dreamy different-world life without her saint title being found out?!
description.fr:
Sei, une accro au travail, se retrouve invoquée par erreur dans un autre monde lors d'un rituel qui a pour but d'invoquer une Sainte qui pourra éradiquer tous les démons. Après son arrivée, seule l'autre jeune fille invoquée en même temps est emmenée voir le Prince. Après avoir quitté le palais, Sei commence à travailler dans un laboratoire de recherches et découvre cette nouvelle vie.

description.it:
Sei, un'impiegata di 20 anni, viene convocata in un altro mondo dopo aver terminato gli straordinari. Ma la persona che l'aveva convocata le dice che non è la santa. Invece, all'altra donna evocata, viene riconosciuto questo titolo, mentre Sei viene ignorata. Offesa per essere stata scartata senza pensarci due volte, Sei lascia il palazzo reale e cerca occupazione, e inizia a lavorare in un laboratorio dove prepara pozioni e cosmetici. Usa la sua magia per soddisfare le richieste delle persone che lentamente iniziano a sospettare che lei sia la vera Santa... Riuscirà Sei a godersi la sua vita da sogno, in un altro mondo, senza che il suo titolo di santa venga scoperto?!

description.ru:
Сей, 20 лет. Была призвана в другой мир после сверхурочной работы. Но человек, который призвал ее, посмотрел и сказал: «Это не святая». Разве это не пренебрежение? С самого начала Сей решила покинуть дворец и начать работать в Исследовательском центре Зелий. Она мирно жила, создавая зелья и косметику. Она помогала людям своей магией и постепенно, они начали подозревать, что она святая. Сможет ли она и дальше жить спокойной жизнью?

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

description.en:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!

This is an unusual romantic comedy for those of you who have things you can't tell others!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

altTitles.en: มิติปริศนา

altTitles.ja: ディメンションW

description.en:
In the future, Nikola Tesla's dream of a 'World System' of electricity is realized. Cords and batteries are a thing of the past, and now people can directly draw energy using devices known as 'coils.' Some people, however, modify these coils for destructive purposes.  
Mabuchi Kyoma, a man who lives in ruins and has a passion for 'vintage' gas-powered cars, has good reason to know what damage these coils can do. He takes on assignments from a fat woman known as Marie, recovering illegal coils in exchange for cash and gasoline. One day, he goes out on one of his usual missions, to retrieve illegal coils from two criminal brothers, Jony and Every Won. When he gets to their gang's hideout, however, there is another stranger there: a mysterious, cloaked captive that appears to be a young lady. Who is she and will this meeting change Kyoma's life?  
  
**Officially published:**  
- In English by Yen Press  
- In French by [Ki-oon](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/tomes-553-dimension-w.html)  
- In German by [Kazé](https://www.kaze-online.de/Programm/Manga/Dimension-W-Band-1.html)  
- In Italian by [Panini Comics](http://comics.panini.it/store/pub_ita_it/mmaso024-it-manga-sound-psycho-pass-n-1.html)  
- In Polish by [Waneko](https://waneko.pl/nasze-mangi/?manga_id=147)  
- In Spanish by [Norma Editorial](https://www.normaeditorial.com/catalogo/S/4442/1/dimension-w/)
description.pt-br: No futuro, cabos e baterias são coisas coisas do passado, e agora, as pessoas podem puxar energia diretamente, usando dispositivos conhecidos como "coils". Mabuchi Kyoma, um homem que vive nas ruínas e tem paixão em coletar carros movidos a gás, ganha uma atribuição de uma grande mulher conhecida como Maria, recuperando coils ilegais em troca de dinheiro e gasolina. Um dia, ele sai em uma de suas missões habituais, para recuperar coils ilegais de dois criminosos, Jony e Every Won. Quando ele chega no esconderijo da gangue, entretanto, havia outro estranho lá: um misterioso, cativo camuflado que parecia ser uma jovem. Quem é ela e como esse encontro mudará a vida de Kyoma?

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: サジちゃんの病み日記

description.en: Sazi-chan has a girl she likes. Though her feelings are too pure for anyone to understand, it is definitely true love. Taking pictures, stealing, stabbing, assaulting, that too, is love.

altTitles.ja: 怪獣くん

description.en:
Musashino Art University, Department of Visual Communication Design, 2021 graduation project.

When he was in elementary school, a boy who had been trying to save his childhood friend from being bullied by a bully turned violent.
Now, as a junior high school student, his classmates nickname him "Kaiju-kun" and distance themselves from him.
One day, a girl who is "half Kaiju" joins his class.
She seems to have come to school to make friends with many people......
A heartwarming monster coming-of-age story about the pain of school life and friendship!

altTitles.ja: ちーちゃん

description.en:
It was the day Chiichan, who never comes to middle school at all, suddenly showed up in her tattered sweats with dead insects, causing a commotion in the class. Yuua has been with her since kindergarten and cares about her, and her classmate Koudai asks if he can help Chiichan out...
A new series born from a unique collaboration, in which Oshimi Shuuzou depicts the prequel to Chiichan, the aberrant heroine of Naitou Eisuke's film *Poison Girl*, as an original manga *Chiichan*!
description.fr: Chii, qui ne vient habituellement pas en cours, se présente un jour vétue de haillons, et un insecte à la main. De quoi faire parler la classe...
description.es-la: Chii-chan, quien rara vez asiste a la escuela secundaria, que viste un desgastado chándal y tiene un hobby peculiar. Un día hace algo que causa miedo en el salón, por lo que, dos jóvenes tratan de ayudarla. Esta nueva serie es una colaboración en la que Shūzō Oshimi dibuja la precuela del extraordinario personaje de Chii-chan, la inusual personaje de la película "Doku Musume" dirigida por Eirō Naitō.

description.en:
A boy x a summer x an adventure = "Boy Meets Crime"!

Shocking juvenile suspense!

One day during the summer vacation, a young boy called Isshin, Kazuma Inui, leaves with his friends who attend the same junior high school to meet again with "that girl" who disappeared several years ago.
And all the truths lead to child kidnapping cases that are rampant in the land. Depicting the darkness of society!

ディーふらぐ!

description.en:
Kazama Kenji likes to believe he is something of a delinquent. Moreover, others seem to like to agree that he is. Of course, Kenji's gang finds their way to a group of four not-so-normal girls - Chitose, Sakura, Minami and Roka - and all at once, whatever reputation he may have, is nothing compared to the outrageous behavior of the girls. Shanghaied into joining their club, what will happen to his everyday life from that point on?  


---
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15705)
description.ru: Печально известный главарь банды Казама Кенжи наталкивается на группу странных девчонок, воображающих, что они владеют магией стихий. В итоге девчонки шантажируют его, чтобы он вступил в их клуб. Итак, приключения начинаются…

description.en:
A woman's bloody revenge against the corrupt nation's highest power begins.
Lim Nayoung, a housewife enjoying the sweet life of a newlywed.
Then one day, her husband returns as a cold corpse, and Nayoung, who feels that her husband, a homicide detective, was murdered, decides to avenge her husband...
in fact, she was seen as an ordinary housewife, was a top killer called "Tarantula," a North Korean secret agent dedicated to terrorist operations such as assassination and kidnapping before defecting from North Korea.

description.en:
A sudden increase in odd killings. A world close to an end gives rise to an unprecedented master detective!!!  
  
The story follows the motivated detective Asano Misaki & her slacker partner Hijirihara Takumi. They work in the Special Crime Investigation agency (SCI), which is in charge of cases judged abnormal or bizarre.
description.pl: Misaki Asano to młoda dziewczyna, która postanowiła dołączyć do Wydziału Spraw Specjalnych, którego głównym zadaniem jest łapanie psychopatów oraz innych ciekawych person, lubiących zabawić się z ludźmi lub ich ciałami. Jej partnerem zostaje dziwny chłopak imieniem Takumi Hijirihara. Można go znaleźć dosłownie wszędzie: w szafce, w pudle, w skrzynce i Bóg wie gdzie jeszcze. Jednak, prócz chowania się w ciasnych miejscach, jego konikiem jest coś jeszcze: morderstwo.
description.pt-br: No mesmo universo de Danganronpa, presenciamos a Unidade Investigativa de Crimes Especiais da Fundação Futuro, que busca desvendar os crimes grotescos que explodiram após o maior, mais terrível e mais trágico evento da história da humanidade! Acompanhe a novata Misaki Asano e seu peculiar e preguiçoso parceiro Takumi Hijirihara em suas investigações enquanto sua unidade tenta descobrir quem é o assassino de assassinos, o Killer Killer!

description.en: One day, first-class Grim Reaper Lisara, for her own reasons, secretly enters the human world. After searching in vain for her target, Lisara is completely exhausted. That's when Ryosuke Kaga approaches her. To help Lisara out, he leads her out of the rain and to his cozy home, where he tells her, "I will do anything to help you." When Lisara hears that, she suddenly embraces Ryosuke and......?!

altTitles.ja: ディー・グレイマン

description.en:
Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
description.ru: Действие манги разворачивается в альтернативной Европе конца 19 века. Мир заселен Акума - созданиями Тысячелетнего Графа, созданными из механизма и человеческой души. Те, кто могут уничтожать Акума и освобождать души заключенные в них, называются экзорцистами, которые наделены некой Чистой Силой. Главный герой манги - Аллен Уолкер, юноша пятнадцати лет, проклятый Акума, носитель Чистой Силы в его левой руке. Путь Аллена Уолкера связан с его любовью к людям и Акума, путь, который принесет ему много неожиданностей…

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

title.en: Cross Ange: Rondo of Angels and Dragons

altTitles.ja-ro: Cross Ange - Tenshi to Ryuu no Rondo

altTitles.ja: クロスアンジュ　天使と竜の輪舞

description.en:
All humans in this world can use the power of the light of mana, and those who can't are considered to be subhuman 'Norma.' The world is like a peaceful utopia, and the celebrated princess Angelize leads a happy life. She believes that the only darkness left in the world is the existence of the horrible Norma.  
However, in a ceremony on her 16th birthday, the truth is revealed–Princess Angelize is a Norma. Now she is going to learn what her society does to Norma. She is sent to an isolated island full of others like her, who are taught that the only reason they are allowed to live is in order to fight to protect the peace of this world. Now "Ange" is part of a squad that pilots Paramails and fights invading extradimensional dragons.

altTitles.ja: コープスパーティー Book of Shadows

description.en: Based on the game of the same name.

altTitles.ja: どみなのド！

description.en: Tsuchie Takeshi has dreams of playing with Hikari-chan as a child. He remembers her as a kind, sweet girl. However, one day on the way home from school, Takeshi is abducted and taken to a huge house, only to find out that she's become an arrogant, violent dominatrix. Furthermore, she says that he promised to marry her! How will he adjust to her new personality, and living with her as a new son of her prestigious family?

altTitles.zh: 古见同学有交流障碍症

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.es: Hitohito Tadano acaba de empezar la secundaria alta anhelando que sea pura paz y tranquilidad, pero sus planes se truncan cuando termina sentado al lado de la perfecta Shoko Komi. Ella es linda, inteligente, educada y hasta huele bien. Pero tiene 0 dotes sociales y no sabe cómo corno comunicarse con los demás. Es ahí que Tadano se sube al pony y se propone ayudarla a su compañera hasta que se haga de cien amigos, y con suerte algo más.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.es-la: El viaje a 100 amigos comienza con una sola conversación. El mayor sueño de la estudiante de secundaria socialmente ansiosa Shouko Komi es hacer amigos, ¡pero todos en la escuela confunden su ansiedad social paralizante con una reserva fría! Con todo el cuerpo estudiantil manteniendo su distancia y Komi incapaz de pronunciar una sola palabra, la amistad podría estar siempre fuera de su alcance. Tadano Hitohito es un chico ordinario total, y así es como le gusta. Vive para mezclarse con el fondo. Todo eso cambia cuando se encuentra solo en un salón de clases el primer día de la escuela secundaria con la legendaria Komi. Rápidamente se da cuenta de que ella no es distante, sino que tiene problemas para comunicarse con los demás. ¡Ahora ha hecho su misión ayudarla en su búsqueda para hacer 100 amigos!
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...
